programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya panics when she hears that Sundarlal has gone missing. Soon, she tells Nattu Kaka to get her tickets to Ahmedabad.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tries to find Sundarlal by calling his friends. However, Sundarlal seems to have vanished without a trace.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya finds Sundarlal at the airport and takes him home. However, Sundarlal tells Daya and Anjali not to let anyone know he has arrived at the society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is conflicted when Jethalal forces her to choose between himself and Sundarlal. Later, Daya enlists Tapu's help to sneak Sundarlal around.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is nervous about Jethalal finding Sundarlal hidden in their house. Later, Jethalal becomes suspicious when Daya is eager for him to leave.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal catches a peek of Sundarlal in his kitchen and assumes it is a burglar. Soon, the rest of Gokuldham Society panics and begins searching for the supposed criminal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Zorawar is on the lookout for Sundarlal and hunts all over the society. However, Sundarlal dresses up as a housemaid to evade capture.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sundarlal dresses up as a woman to disguise himself. However, chaos ensues when the other residents assume Sundarlal is Popatlal's girlfriend.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Holi celebrations continue in full swing. Meanwhile, Zorawar and his men hunt for Sundarlal all over Gokuldham Society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Champaklal's feet hurt, Jethalal and Tapu fight over helping him. Later, Jethalal feels embarrassed in front of Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal's phone stops functioning and he tries various techniques to fix the problem. Later, he decides to purchase a smartphone from Jethalal's store.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: CID

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya excitedly rush to get the perfect gift for Babita's birthday party. On the other hand, Babita and Iyer's grand party begins in full swing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya reach right on time for Babita's bash and learn that they failed to get the perfect gift for her. Later, Champaklal attends the party and feels horrified to find Daya in a dress.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is unable to come up with a thoughtful quote to write on the public chalkboard. Later, Champaklal comes by and suggests a great thought for him to use.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal learns that Jethalal wants to go to Sanghvi's birthday party and scolds him for desiring to leave his family to stay out late at night.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal humiliates Jethalal in public for coming home late. Later, Jethalal begins to resent him for overreacting to a small mistake.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita brings frocks for Khushi. In the park, Champaklal sees a woman playing with Khushi, but she runs away when he tries to talk to her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society are excited to spend time with Khushi. A strange couple notices Khushi in Gada Electronics.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After checking the maintenance cheques, Bhide calls Jethalal to ask him for his cheque, but they end up arguing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide calls Popatlal when he notices that Popatlal's maintenance cheque has no signature, but Popatlal ignores him. Bhide then devises a plan to trick Popatlal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal tells Gokuldham men about a mysterious woman who offers to drop him to his office when he is late, and desires to meet her again.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide reminds Popatlal about his maintenance cheque, but they end up arguing. Later, Popatlal dreams of meeting his mysterious woman again.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal finally meets his mysterious woman and proposes to her. Popatlal's dream comes true when she agrees, and everyone is overjoyed and departs the Gokuldham society on bicycles.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While Popatlal waits for the woman at the same place where they met, she arrives at Gokuldham society to return his pen.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sodhi misunderstands when he sees Popatlal helping a groundnut vendor on the road. He thinks that Popatlal sells groundnuts to make money to pay the maintenance costs, and later informs the members.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak and the others are frightened to learn about the mysterious boy who suddenly disappeared during Dahi Handi and try to find him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal, who is carrying a huge amount of money, realises that someone is following him. He begins to worry more when he notices that the person is also taking his pictures.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Jethalal finds himself in a tough situation, he shares his ordeal with Taarak. Meanwhile, Taarak ponders over the ever-increasing crime rate.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak Mehta shares his clever plan with the men of the society to trap the strange person who is taking Jethalal's pictures.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak Mehta and Jethalal land in unforseen circumstances when a woman accuses Taarak of taking her pictures.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After Daya informs them about the saree sale in the city, all the women plan to take their husband's permission and go shopping together for sarees.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Jethalal refuses to allow Daya to go shopping for sarees, she devises a clever plan to persuade him. Later, all the women set off together to peruse the sale on sarees.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is shocked when she finds out the sarees she buys are defective. Meanwhile, all the women discover some defect in all the clothes they buy.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya and all the women go back to return the defective sarees, but the owner rudely turns them down. Later, the women inform their husbands about the problem, but they are too busy to help.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya and others reach the police station to register a complaint against the saree store owner, but the inspector advises them to register a complaint with the consumer forum.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After failing to provide justice to them, the women decide to protest in front of the saree shop.
